thread.title: Liverpool lose D Joe Gomez for the rest of the season
thread.title_full: Liverpool lose D Joe Gomez for the rest of the season

author: paulmbanks
title: Liverpool lose D Joe Gomez for the rest of the season
text:
Tweet 
Liverpool Defender Joe Gomez, acquired this summer from Charlton Athletic, is now lost for the season according to Press Association Sport . 
Gomez, brought in to replace for Sebastian Coates , who was sold to Sunderland, was taken from the field after injuring his right knee in the 80th minute of England Under-21s’ 3-0 victory over Kazakhstan Tuesday night. This is a blow to Liverpool whose coach Brendan Rodgers was sacked last week. The Reds are now under the direction of Jurgen Klopp. The new coach comes in from Borussia Dortmund, Germany, where he won titles in the 2010-11 and 2011-12 seasons. His first game as Manager at Liverpool will be versus a Tottenham Hotspur side that is undefeated in their last seven. Joe Gomez came over from the Championship side Charlton for £3.5 million. Paul M. Banks owns, operates and sometimes writes The Sports Bank.net , which is partnered with FOX Sports Engage Network. The website is also featured on News Now. Banks, a former writer for the Washington Times, currently contributes to the Chicago Tribune RedEye. He also appears regularly on numerous talk shows all across the country. Catch him Tuesdays on KOZN 1620 The Zone.
